original_text: Edom is there, too, with its kings and leaders. They were powerful, but now they lie in their graves, among those who have died in battle. They have gone down into the deep hole of death with those who do not belong to God. Edom is there, too, with its kings and leaders. They were powerful, but now they lie in their graves, among those who have died in battle. They have gone down into the deep hole of death with those who do not belong to God. Edom is there, too, with its kings and leaders. They were powerful, but now they lie in their graves, among those who have died in battle. They have gone down into the deep hole of death with those who do not belong to God.
korean_text: 거기에 에돔 곧 그 왕들과 그 모든 고관이 있음이여 그들이 강성하였었으나 칼에 죽임을 당한 자와 함께 있겠고 할례를 받지 못하고 구덩이에 내려간 자와 함께 누우리로다

sentences.original_text: Edom is there, too,
with its kings and leaders.
They were powerful,
but now they lie in their graves,
among those who have died in battle.
They have gone down into the deep hole of death
with those who do not belong to God.
Edom is there, too,
with its kings and leaders.
They were powerful,
but now they lie in their graves,
among those who have died in battle.
They have gone down into the deep hole of death
with those who do not belong to God.
Edom is there, too,
with its kings and leaders.
They were powerful,
but now they lie in their graves,
among those who have died in battle.
They have gone down into the deep hole of death
with those who do not belong to God.
